articles.title: iPhone 15 Screen time will save you from weak eyesight; know how to manage it - step-by-step guide - HT Tech
articles.description: Apple iPhone 15 Screen time feature allows users to take control of their device. It offers tools to schedule breaks, set app usage limits, and prioritize essential contacts. It will likely save you from suffering from weak eyesight later in life.
